>

</MethodEndpoint>



Create a vector store file batch.

Generate an OpenAI-compatible vector store file batch for the given vector store.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"vector_store_id","in":"path","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"},"description":"Path parameter: vector_store_id"}]}
>

</ParamsDetails>
